main event: A disc-shaped object with a dome was observed making zig-zag flight patterns and maneuvers at the Travis County Prison in Georgia on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 minutes and emitted red smoke from its exhaust.
The object was described as moving very high and extremely fast, not resembling a jet aircraft.
The object faded from view as it flew towards the southwest.
The object was reported to be shaped like a basketball and made of aluminum, lighting up.
The object was estimated to be at an elevation angle of 9-33 degrees as it flew a level flight path.
